item.title: High Availability WordPress LAMP Stack – Part 2
item.description: Setting up the Software Stack This article is the second in a series (see part 1 here). Please see HA Network for the first part in setting up the network topology to be highly available. It’s all good having a redundant network design, but putting web servers and the like on our hypervisors doesn’t make them redundant. In the event where there’s a failure on one of our servers, all virtual machines on that server will die.
